--- title: "KIND network update" format: html editor_options: chunk_output_type: console execute: echo: false message: false --- ```{=html} ``` ## Week beginning Mon 17th March 2025 Dear colleagues, Welcome to the regular KIND network update. I'm starting to schedule the next batch of training dates, so here are some save-the-dates for your calendar: + Excel for beginners, six weekly sessions running Wednesdays 1-2pm from April 23rd - May 28th + Intermediate Excel, five weekly sessions running Tuesdays 10-11.30am from April 22nd - May 20th + Power BI for beginners, four weekly sessions running Thursdays 1-2.30pm from April 24th - May 15th You can expect to see a proper announcement with booking links etc for those sessions over the next week or so on the KIND network Teams channel. Hope to see you at something soon. Brendan --- ## Wins of The Week In the spirit of [#IAmRemarkable](https://www.rmrkblty.org/iamremarkable), we do a weekly wins of the week thread to celebrate the professional (and personal) achievements of the community: + Finally managed to concentrate on a task I've had on my list since August + Was asked to support an extensive audit of Programme Assurance documentation - painstaking but rewarding. And what was once a workstream that gave me the fear - I actually really enjoyed it + I had the fun task of making training videos this week, I used the 'video project' tool within clipchamp on MS Stream and it was surprisingly painless. The trainers were happy with them! + I was able to build an SSRS report with a drill through capability and also with KPI Score Cards Well done all, and looking forward to [hearing your wins of the week](https://forms.office.com/e/8DgpNP6rcK) in future. --- ## Training sessions Click the link to book yourself into the session. `````{=html}
